#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 10000
int p[505];
int w[505];
int dp[10002];
bool  b[10002];
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = getchar_unlocked();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = getchar_unlocked()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main(){
	int t;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--){
		int e,f,i,n,j;
		scanint(e);
		scanint(f);
		scanint(n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanint(p[i]);
			scanint(w[i]);
		}
		memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		memset(b,0,sizeof(b));
		b[0]=true;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
				for(j=w[i];j<=MAX;j++){
						if(b[j-w[i]] && dp[j]!=0){
							dp[j]=(((dp[j-w[i]]+p[i])<dp[j])?(dp[j-w[i]]+p[i]):dp[j]);
							b[j]=true;
						}
						else if(b[j-w[i]] && dp[j]==0){
							dp[j]=dp[j-w[i]]+p[i];
							b[j]=true;
						}
				}
		}
		if(!b[f-e])
			printf("This is impossible.\n");
		else
			printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",dp[f-e]);
	}
return 0;}
